Name: verb object order wals
Description: dominant verb-object order as provided by WALS-83A

Name: adposition order
Description: dominant order of adpositions relative to nominal complement

Name: adposition order wals
Description: dominant order of adpositions relative to nominal complement as provided by WALS-85A

Name: genitive order
Description: dominant order of genitive modifiers relative to nominal head

Name: genitive order wals
Description: dominant order of genitive modifiers relative to nominal head as provided by WALS-86A

Name: demonstrative order
Description: dominant order of demonstrative modifiers relative to nominal head

Name: demonstrative order wals
Description: dominant order of demonstrative modifiers relative to nominal head as provided by WALS-88A

Name: article distinct third
Description: presence/absence of a definite article that is distinct from a third person pronoun

Name: demonstrative as third
Description: marks whether the language has a third person pronoun that is distinct from a demonstrative pronoun

Name: nominal person
Description: Indicates whether an expression of nominal person is attested for the language; intended as a shorthand to identify languages with any expression of nominal person, equivalent to finding entries with explicit values in apc_order and either NULL or False values in bound_person_order

Name: APC order
Description: relative order of an adnominal pronoun in an adnominal pronoun construction (APC, 'we linguists') relative to the remaining nominal expression

Name: bound person order
Description: relative order of a bound person marker in an bound person construction (e.g. in Khoekhoe/Nama) relative to the remaining nominal expression

Name: person allowed
Description: restrictions on grammatical persons occurring adnominally; contains question marks in cases where sources are suggestive, but not entirely specific (if a more clear-cut dataset is desired, check person_third_available)

Name: person third available
Description: availability of third person adnominal person marking; contains question marks in cases where sources are suggestive, but not entirely specific

Name: number allowed
Description: restrictions on number marking in adnominal person

Name: PPDC
Description: person/pronoun-demonstrative construction, availability of demonstratives co-occurring in expressions with adnominal person marking
